description: Number of indefinitely growing n-step self-avoiding walks on Manhattan lattice.
references: S. S. Manna and A. J. Guttmann, Kinetic growth walks..., J. Phys. A 22 (1989), 3113-3122.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
